alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Weld County through 515 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Rockport, or 22 miles south of Cheyenne, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Weld County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
